common.network_notice_desc:
Please change network on {{wallet}} to 
 {{network}} to continue.

message.E4: The below transactions cannot be processed [Delete them]
message.E8: Insufficient token balance on your account
message.E9: Insufficient NEAR balance on your account
message.E10: Your transactions are sent. However, some failed. Please retry.
message.E19: Please select at least 1 address to continue
message.S1: All your transactions were sent out successfully. You can now download your transaction report.

home.title:
Bulk send NEAR and 
 NEP-141 tokens in one click
home.cta: Fed up of wasting time manually sending out multiple transactions on NEAR Protocol ? Nearsend is for you! Bulk-transacting on NEAR has never been easier.

block_multiple_tabs.title: Multiple tabs detected
block_multiple_tabs.content: You have been redirected to this page because there are more than one Nearsend.io page opened. It may cause problems with Browser LocalStorage. Please close this page and go to the previous one.

send_token.send_token_notice: Transactions were sent out. Please wait until all transactions are mined
send_token.confirm_transaction: Transactions are being sent. Please wait until all transactions are sent. ï»¿You will be able to download a report once the last transaction is sent.
send_token.storage_registered: The address has registered storage for the sending token
send_token.storage_unregistered: The address has NOT registered storage for the sending token
send_token.storage_registration_desc: This setting is used to filter the addresses that have registered (or not registered) storage for the sending token
send_token.notice_storage_fee_need: NEAR Protocol requires a storage fee for addresses that are yet to interact with the token you are sending. We have compiled a list of those addresses below. Please select and/or deselect recipient addresses to confirm your final list.
send_token.notice_no_storage_fee_need: Please select and/or deselect recipient addresses to confirm your final list.
send_token.note_handle_duplicate_address: NOTE: Duplicate addresses have been merged and amounts are added together.
send_token.double_check: Please double check the list of addresses before continuing.
send_token.confirm_go_back: You will lose the report after leaving this page. Are you sure you want to leave this page?

summary.title: Summary
summary.total_token: Total number of tokens to be sent

prepare.upload_instruction: Drop your files here or click to upload
prepare.placeholder_address: Select token or input token address
prepare.placeholder_recipient: Insert address and amount, separated by commas
